The Abundancy is now part of global creative powerhouse Leo Burnett. We're an incubator that helps brands get chosen. We help our partners predict consumer trends and behavior, respond with personalized content and experiences, increase value and performance through technology and re-imagine the future of marketing. Our clients include global lifestyle brands, retail companies, healthcare systems and aggressive start-ups.
